name: Feature Request
about: Suggest an idea for MAS-UI
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: 'enhancement'
assignees: ''

---

## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement
Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe:
- What problem does this solve?
- Who would benefit from this feature?
- Current workaround (if any)

## Proposed Solution
Describe the solution you'd like:
- How would this feature work?
- What would the user experience be like?
- Any specific implementation details you have in mind?

## Alternatives Considered
Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered:
- What other approaches could solve this problem?
- Why is your proposed solution better?

## Use Cases
Provide specific use cases for this feature:
1. Use case 1: ...
2. Use case 2: ...
3. Use case 3: ...

## Mockups/Examples
If applicable, add mockups, diagrams, or examples to help explain your idea:
- Screenshots from similar applications
- Hand-drawn mockups
- Code examples
- API design suggestions

## Implementation Considerations
Things to consider when implementing this feature:
- Breaking changes?
- Performance impact?
- Security considerations?
- Backward compatibility?

## Additional Context
Add any other context about the feature request here:
- Links to related issues or discussions
- References to similar features in other projects
- Research or data supporting this feature

## Are you willing to contribute?
- [ ] I'm willing to submit a PR for this feature
- [ ] I can help with testing
- [ ] I can help with documentation
- [ ] I can provide feedback on implementation
